sentence.Network_en: He took his flashlight from his jacket pocket and switched it on.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从夹克口袋里拿出手电筒，打开开关。

sentence.Network_en: The troopers, by flashlight, were searching the immediate area.
sentence.Network_cn: 州警们正拿着手电筒在附近地区搜查。

sentence.Network_en: She froze when the beam of the flashlight struck her.
sentence.Network_cn: 当手电筒的光照到她身上时她僵住了。

entry.def: A flashlight is a small electric light which gets its power from batteries and which you can carry in your hand.

example.ex: Len studied it a moment in the beam of his flashlight...
example.tran: 莱恩借着手电筒的光亮把它仔细研究了一会儿。

example.ex: The troopers, by flashlight, were searching the immediate area.
example.tran: 州警们正拿着手电筒在附近地区搜查。

means.word_mean: 1. a small portable battery-powered electric lamp

sentences.en: I saw the sudden flare of a flashlight in the darkness.
sentences.cn: 我看到手电筒在黑暗中突然闪出的亮光。

sentences.en: I could see the beam of his flashlight waving around in the dark.
sentences.cn: 我可以看到他的手电筒光在黑暗中上下舞动。

sentences.en: The man searched the whole house with a flashlight inside out.
sentences.cn: 那人拿着电筒把整个屋子里里外外搜查了一遍。
